title: TEKKEN 7
notes: There is some shader compile stutter at the beginning of every match, but it lasts only a few seconds.

title: Tekken 7
notes: Performance differs a lot between stages. Hard to reach 60 fps on medium/high settings (should be no problem, not a demanding game).

title: Tekken 7
notes: Ultra, 1440p, 55-60 fps. Shader compile stutters are practically gone (most if not all stutter happens in loading screen). Xbox 360 controller works.
Never really starts. First a windows box that says something about failed to connect to network, then a brief small black window and then it quits.

title: TEKKEN 7

notes: runs well but performances are not good . Under 60fps for a fighting game in 1440p is not good enough
title: TEKKEN 7

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 470 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.13-1-MANJARO, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Runs at 55-60 fps on high/ultra settings. I played a few hours of treasure battle, practice, and story mode without any issue. Xbox 360 controller and Hori arcade stick worked out of the box. I had a issue with "the server being unreachable", but this was solved by starting the game once in Steam runtime. The game works flawlessly in both runtime and native now.
title: TEKKEN 7

notes: I had proton 3.7-6 Beta defined in my settings, installed it and it ran almost perfectly. Keyboard settings don't seem to want to change,  though.
title: TEKKEN 7

notes: Game launches and is playable. Setting shadow quality higher than "Low" leads to extremely poor frame rates. Issues with game registering Xbox controller's left analog stick as being stuck in the upper-left position.

title: TEKKEN 7

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-1-MANJARO, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: "The server is not reachable, check your internet connection and click "Retry"" DRM issue solved with STEAM_RUNTIME=1 Then would not launch because of "DX11 feature level 10.0 is required to run the engine". "dxlevel 11" and "DXVK_FAKE_DX11_SUPPORT=1" arguments both didn't work. Winetricks d3dx11_42 - 43 on proton prefix didn't help either. Game shows splash screen then reports errors and closes.
title: TEKKEN 7

notes: Game runs perfectly, in fullscreen with constant 60 fps using Proton 3.7-7 Beta
title: TEKKEN 7

notes: runs perfectly for me. No issue with servers.
title: TEKKEN 7

notes: Nvidia card users experiencing poor frame rates can spoof an AMD card to work around failed NVAPI calls and improve performance (https://www.reddit.com/r/SteamPlay/comments/9m18ck/troubleshooting_performance/).
